TopicTitle: Loading specific save breaks RnD and Astronaut Complex globally until reinstall.

Articles.Content:
I started a new game and after a few missions I found that the GUI fails to work for both the astronaut complex and the Research and Development buildings. (See attached image) All the buttons however are still functional. Loading another save file, restarting the game, and restarting my computer all don't fix it. As soon as I load the new game I started the above problem persists globally until I reinstall KSP. Has anyone else experienced this or anything similar?

Edit: I am able to view the astronaut complex from the Vehicle Assembly Building, but it breaks again immediately after I leave it. Not sure if its entirely related but the GUI in both the VAB and SPH seem to flicker randomly as well.

 

save.zip

output_log.txt

Running windows 10, KSP 1.1.3 via. Steam.

Using an AMD FX-8350

Using an Nvidia GTX 950

32/64 bit executable doesn't make a difference.

 

Edited July 20, 2016 by Rion1337
